internal.content: --- title: Event-Driven Architecture Use Cases description: Event-Driven Architecture use cases --- Kafka Connect Use Cases Kafka Streams Use Cases Kafka Monitoring Use Cases EDITOR'S NOTE: This page should have sections that mirror the Technology sections sub-directories. ## Kafka Connect Use Cases | Scenario | Description | Link | | --------------------------------| ------------------ |:----------- | | Kafka Connect - AWS S3 Source & Sink | Source & Sink connector use cases using the Apache Camel Kafka Connector project. | [Kafka Connect - S3](/use-cases/connect-s3/) | | Kafka Connect - IBM Cloud Object Storage Sink | Sink connector use case using the IBM Cloud Object Storage Sink Connector. | [Kafka Connect - COS](/use-cases/connect-cos/) | | Kafka Connect - IBM MQ Sink | Sink connector use case using the IBM MQ Sink Connector. | [Kafka Connect - MQ](/use-cases/connect-mq/) | | Kafka Connect - JDBC Sink | Sink connector use case using the community-sourced JDBC Sink Connector. | [Kafka Connect - JDBC](/use-cases/connect-jdbc/) | | Kafka Connect - IBM RabbitMQ Source | Source connector use case using the RabbitMQ Sink Connector. | [Kafka Connect - RabbitMQ](/use-cases/connect-rabbitmq/) | ## Kafka Streams Use Cases | Scenario | Description | Link | | --------------------------------| ------------------ |:----------- | | Kafka Streams Hands-on Labs | Hands-on labs for Kafka Streams applications with Quarkus. | [Kafka Streams Labs](/use-cases/kafka-streams/) | ## Kafka Monitoring Use Cases | Scenario | Description | Link | | --------------------------------| ------------------ |:----------- | | Monitoring IBM Event Streams on IBM Cloud | Hands-on labs for monitoring IBM Event Streams on IBM Cloud, utilizing native platform Sysdig integration. | [Monitoring on IBM Cloud](/use-cases/monitoring-on-cloud/) | | Monitoring IBM Event Streams on Red Hat OpenShift | Hands-on labs for monitoring IBM Event Streams on Red Hat OpenShift, utilizing native Prometheus support. | [Monitoring on OpenShift](/use-cases/monitoring-on-ocp) |
